email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope you're doing well.

We have a vessel available for your wheat shipment from Buenos Aires to Shanghai. The cargo size is 12,000MT, and we are offering a freight rate of $55 per metric ton under CIF terms.

The vessel, MV OCEAN HORIZON, has a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 225m. The laycan is flexible, but we suggest a window of 2023-10-10 to 2023-10-15.

Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Ocean Cargo Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the quote. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Could you consider lowering it to $50 per metric ton? Also, could you provide the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Michael Lee
Chartering Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your feedback. Considering your request, we can offer a revised rate of $52 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $8,000 per day.

Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Ocean Cargo Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

The revised rate of $52 per metric ton is acceptable. However, we need to confirm the laytime start and end dates. Can you confirm the laycan window of 2023-10-10 to 2023-10-15?

Best regards,
Michael Lee
Chartering Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Shanghai - Laycan Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

The laycan window of 2023-10-10 to 2023-10-15 is confirmed. The laytime will be 5 days, with a demurrage rate of $8,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Ocean Cargo Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

The terms are acceptable. Please proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Michael Lee
Chartering Logistics

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Shanghai - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

The booking is confirmed. We will send the final documents shortly.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Ocean Cargo Brokers
